DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , parallel control , clinical-trial aim evaluate therapeutic efficacy 532nm laser partially subthreshold panretinal photocoagulation PASCAL endpoint management function severe non-proliferative diabetic retinopathy .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Effectiveness Study 532nm Laser Subthreshold Panretinal Photocoagulation Severe NPDR
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , parallel control , clinical-trial aim evaluate therapeutic efficacy 532nm laser partially subthreshold panretinal photocoagulation PASCAL endpoint management function severe non-proliferative diabetic retinopathy : ( 1 ) To evaluate therapeutic effect 532nm laser partially subthreshold panretinal photocoagulation PASCAL endpoint management function severe non-proliferative diabetic retinopathy ; ( 2 ) To compare side effect 532nm laser partially subthreshold panretinal photocoagulation PASCAL endpoint management function retina traditional visible endpoint panretinal photocoagulation .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis severe nonproliferative diabetic retinopathy Age:4580 year Best correct visual acuity ( BCVA ) ≥20/100 , Myopia≤6 degree ( 6D ) No photocoagulation ( PRP ) clinical trial major ocular surgery ( include cataract extraction , intraocular surgery ) within 3 month Ability willingness provide inform consent Participate clinical trial within 3 month Severe refractive medium turbidity ; Unable accept laser treatment nystagmus , etc Medically mentally unstable ( include cardiovascular disorder , cerebrovascular disease , liver kidney disease , hematological disorder psychosis Conditions opinion investigator would interfere trial result increase risk Conditions opinion investigator would preclude participation study
